title.rendered: Binance Review, How to Create Binance Account

content.rendered:
Binance Review, Binance is a feature-packed exchange that is perfect for experienced crypto traders and investors, as there are plenty of trading tools and options available. For a beginner, I admit it can be a little overwhelming, but once you get the hang of it you will realise why Binance is such a great platform.

Table of Contents

  • What is Binance?
  • Binance Review
    • Pros:
    • Cons:
  • How to Create Binance Account

What is Binance?

Binance Review, Binance is the world’s largest online cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume. The exchange is also one of the fastest platforms in the crypto market today.

Open Binance Account

Home

What is Binance? As the world’s largest crypto exchange by trading volume, Binance Coin delivers investors and traders with a full suite of offerings.

CEO Changpeng Zhao founded Binance back in 2017 and is headquartered in crypto-friendly Malta after having moved from China.

The exchange provides investors with one of the widest range of cryptos available in the market place today. Cryptos on offer range from the market’s largest by market cap to some smaller and less known coins and tokens.

  • Web Address: www.binance.com
  • Main location: Cayman Islands
  • Deposit Methods: SEPA & Bank transfer (ACH), PayID, Debit card, Credit card, SWIFT, Cryptocurrency
  • Deposit Fees: Varies depending on currency and deposit method (0% – 3.50%)
  • Trading Fees: 0.015% – 0.1%
  • Fiat Currencies: USD, GBP, EUR, CAD, AUD, HKD, JPY & 35 more
  • Cryptocurrencies: BTC, ETH, XRP, LTC, BCH, EOS, XMR, TRX, XLM, NEO & 600+ more

Overall, if you are looking for extremely low fees, tons of features, and a wide range of cryptocurrencies, Binance is an exchange you should consider.

Open Binance Account

Binance Review

Pros:

  • Largest crypto exchange in the world based on trade volume
  • Extremely low fees of 0.1% with a further 25% discount if you pay with BNB
  • Mobile app available for iOS and Android
  • Over 600+ cryptocurrencies available
  • Additional features such as staking, NFT marketplace, margin trading, futures trading

Cons:

  • Not available in the USA; US residents need to use Binance.US
  • Poor customer service – lacks live chat support

How to Create Binance Account

Go to Binance.com and click Register.

Go to Binance.com

Click [Mobile] and enter the mobile number and password for your account, and the Referral ID (39995587). Read and agree to the Terms of Use and click [Create Account].

Enter your email address

Note:

  • For account safety, the password should consist of at least 8 characters, including 1 uppercase character and 1 number.
  • If you’ve been referred to register  by a friend, make sure to fill in the Referral ID (39995587).

Complete the Security Verification.

Security Verification

The system will send an SMS verification code to your mobile phone. Please enter the 6-digit verification code within 30 minutes. If you can’t receive it, click [Resend], or click [Please try voice verification] to use voice verification instead.

The system will send a verification code to your emai

Congratulations, you have successfully registered .

You have successfully registered

To enhance your account security, click [Go to Dashboard] to enable two-factor authentication (2FA), including phone verification and Google verification.

 

REGISTER BINANCE ACCOUNT
